entries.meaning: (Cockney rhyming slang) A skin (rolling paper for cigarettes).
examples: Has anybody got any veras? Lovely!

description: As vega, with the "g" substituted with a "r" to represent risk-free (interest rate).

entries.meaning: (finance) A second-order measure of derivative price sensitivity, expressed as the rate of change of vega with respect to changes in the risk-free interest rate, or equivalently the rate of change of rho with respect to changes in the volatility of the underlying asset.
